name: agate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hard stone with patterns of different colours, often bands (= long, narrow pieces) of colour that are translucent (= partly transparent): There are many varieties of agate from moss agate to layered or banded agate. When I was about 10 years old, I started collecting and polishing agates.
More examplesFewer examplesMy mum has a brooch with a slice of agate that looks like a landscape.From the outside the nodules are lumpy white spheres, but when cut in half and polished they are revealed as banded agates.The archaeologists discovered beads of gold, carnelian and agate.
